resources.string: 1. The name \"Canada\" comes from the Iroquois word \"Kanata.\" What does that word mean in English?
2. What are the official languages of Canada?
3. Canada is the second largest country in the world.
4. Which biggest Canadian province or territory has the smallest number of people living there.
5. Most of Ontario\'s Southern border follows a line of lakes called "The Great Lakes"\. How many are there?
